```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r}
layers_names <- st_layers("data/ACS_2019_5YR_TRACT_48_TEXAS.gdb")

layers_names <- layers_names[1]

layer_names_table <- layers_names %>% 
  kable(ncol = 2) %>% 
  kable_paper()
layer_names_table
```

```{r}
rows <- length(layers_names$name) / 2

# col1 <- layers_names$name[1:16]
# col2 <- layers_names$name[17:32]

col1 <- layers_names$name[1:rows]
col2 <- layers_names$name[(rows + 1):(rows * 2)]

two_col <- kable(list(col1, col2),
                 col.names = "Layer Name", caption = "ACS Layers") %>% 
  kable_paper()

two_col
```
